title: Chris Rugan birthday, a swing and a miss!
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080708215055im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/RuganBday_5219.png)

ChrisL

 [‹ Desmin](http://web.archive.org/web/20080708215055/http:/www.typophile.com/node/43629 "Go to previous forum topic") [New avatar problems ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080708215055/http:/www.typophile.com/node/42127 "Go to next forum topic")
author: dezcom

comments.content: Thanks, for the reminder, Chris! I should be flogged for missing his day. Mr. Rugen is a very pleasant, intelligent fellow whose [blog](http://web.archive.org/web/20080708215055/http:/currentconfig.com/) is an undiscovered gem for designers and thinkers.
Congratulations on the new little one, and happy Birthday, Chris. See you in Buffalo.

Happy Birthday. Looking forward to meeting lots of people in Buffalo this year myself, and I don’t think there are any guns allowed at the convention at all. We should be safe from everything but the rim shots that follow Mr. Lozos’ puns.

Thanks so much for the kind birthday wishes, guys! I practically forgot my own birthday this year, as we’ve got our new little one in the family.

If anyone’s wondering “Who the heck is Chris?” I should be in Buffalo this year for TypeCon (had to miss last year). Perhaps I’ll print myself a t-shirt with my avatar on it, as I’m a little gun-shy at conventions. Always happy to meet the folks ’behind the Georgia’ here on Typophile.

And this year, I’ll try to be _punkt_ual.

::har har::

(That was for you, Chris L.)
I will know you even minus an avatar shirt! But it’s still not a bad idea. Oh yeah, and happy B-day too!

We’re all fashionably late to your birthday, awesome.

\*Raises pint\* Happy Birthday, Chris!
